org.araneaframework.http.service
Class WindowClosingService

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.BaseComponent
      org.araneaframework.core.BaseService
          org.araneaframework.http.service.WindowClosingService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Component, Service
public class WindowClosingService
extends BaseService

Service that returns response that closes browser window that made the request; and if possible, reloads the opener of that window.

In 2.0 version, this class was simplified for extending the default solution. Now the referenced JavaScript files can be specified using the setScriptsImportFileNames(String[]) variable, the parent window reloading script can be specified through setReloadParentScript(String) (note that URL will be injected to the positional parameter '{0}'!), and the popup close script can be customized through setDelayedCloseScript(String) variable. Using these three properties should be enough to avoid changing the HTML response entirely for most of the cases.

Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org), Martti Tamm (martti@araneaframework.org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Services provide their services through the action(...) method. An implementation of a non-composite service like BaseService uses the action method to hook in the middle of the action routing and provide filtering, logging etc.

setDelayedCloseScript

public void setDelayedCloseScript(String delayedCloseScript)
The script that closes the popup, with delay (recommended). It is called right after reloadParentScript.

Parameters:
delayedCloseScript - The script that closes the popup, with delay (recommended). May be null.
Since:
2.0

setReloadParentScript

public void setReloadParentScript(String reloadParentScript)
The script that reloads popup parent page. It is called right before delayedCloseScript.

reloadParentScript - The script that reloads popup parent page. May be null.
Since:
2.0

setScriptsImportFileNames

public void setScriptsImportFileNames(String[] scriptsImportFileNames)
Sets the scripts that the file importer will load. These scripts should be necessary to close the popup.

Parameters:
scriptsImportFileNames - The paths to javascript files that file-importer recognizes.
Since:
2.0
